founders.name: Alex MacCaw
founders.message: “He was one of the first checks in. He didn't stop there, though - he then started introducing me to customers, and then he introduced me to potential employees. And our CRO, a completely pivotal hire, was hired through a referral from Rafael. He was probably our most useful investor.”

founders.name: Max Mullen
founders.message: “Rafael has been a friend to me, and to Instacart, since the beginning. He helped us find key employees and tell our story to investors. And most importantly, Rafael is extremely easy to work with and always willing to help - even on short notice.”

founders.name: Arnold Engel
founders.message: “Rafael's been really great to work with. He's got a great perspective on the ecosystem, not just his perspective as an entrepreneur but having seen things from a couple different angles as a VC. He's super responsive and yet he's also out of the way when you don't really need him.”

founders.name: Vlad Magdalin
founders.message: “Rafael has been one of our most active and honestly helpful investors at Webflow, starting from the very early days when it was just the 3 founders. He helped us define our pitch deck early on, helped recruit a big portion of our early engineering team, and has really consistently been there with motivation and tons of advice along the way.”

founders.name: Nick Narodny
founders.message: “Rafael is the type of investor that every founder dreams of in the early days. Within hours of investing in our first round, Rafael was on the phone with me strategizing on how we could fill out the round with the best people possible. And when he made introductions to top marketplace entrepreneurs, his introductions carried a lot of weight.”

founders.name: Kendall Tucker
founders.message: “Working with Rafael is awesome. He doesn't beat around the bush, helps you figure out what to do, inspires you to be the best that you can be, and is constantly teaching about entrepreneurship and fundraising. it's been a pleasure”

founders.name: Jeremy Conrad
founders.message: “Having Rafael as an investor at Quartz is one of the best decisions I've made so far. He's one of the most insightful people in the Valley and whenever I have a problem he can hop on a call with me, that day, and give me advice that I can't get from anyone else.”

founders.name: Matt O'Connor
founders.message: “Rafael's help is pretty unique in the scheme of things because he's seen pretty much every angle: both operator, investor, larger investor, smaller investor, earlier stage, middle, late stage, so he has a lot of lenses and you can tell that by the way he gives advice and, you know, helps trouble shoot problems when things arise.”

founders.name: David Vivero
founders.message: “I've known Rafael for almost a decade and I've chosen to work with him in so many different capacities. He is practical, supportive, knows exactly what it's like to be a founder and helps us reach a little bit higher as a team.”

founders.name: Michaël Villar
founders.message: “I felt a great connection with Rafael as soon as we met. It was my first time fund raising and he was so helpful during that process. You know you can get together on last minute calls and discuss any details that come to mind.”
